tutorial.speak:
Thank you for signing up for B1.church. I’d like to show you a couple things to get you started with the programs. Using Google Chrome, Log in to B1.church.
Click sign in and enter your username and password.
This will take you to the B1.church Admin dashboard. From here, you can manage your church’s data base, website, mobile app, lessons, and more.
Click on settings to set up your church’s information, administrative roles and other details.
Click on the edit pencil to set up your church information.
Back on the dashboard, click the question mark icon in the top right corner for help and tutorials.
Click view documentation.
You will see a list of tutorials to help you get started with B1.church. A word of caution: because we are constantly updating and improving B1.church, some of these tutorials may be slightly out of date.
Now navigate back to the dashboard and click the arrow next to your profile picture and choose switch app
Choose lessons.church
This will take you to Lessons.church, where you can manage your church’s online lessons and curriculum.
Switch back to B1.church by clicking the arrow next to your profile picture and choosing switch app again.
You can now enter B1.church through the member portal or the admin portal. The member portal allows you to see how B1.church looks to your members, view your groups and manage your personal donations.
This video is just a brief introduction to B1.church. Be sure to watch our tutorials to help you get the most out of these programs. Feel free to reach out to our support team with any questions you may have. Thanks for choosing B1.church!
